metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5203 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
Double free vulnerability in the jasper_image_stop_load function in JasPer 1.900.17 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted JPEG 2000 image file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5203` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjasper-runtime - 1.900.1-14ubuntu3.5
libjasper1 - 1.900.1-14ubuntu3.5
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> upstream and proposed patch breaks ABI

criterions.comment: jasper package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.900.1-14ubuntu3.5').
